website_summaries.verdict: Gives you excellent startup speeds, thanks to the inclusion of solid state drive (SSD) storage hardware.
pros: Uses an Intel Core i5 processor with a Turbo Boost feature, which will provide enough processing power for typical computing tasks
Offers all of the latest wireless connection protocols
Contains 11 ports for USB, HDMI, and VGA connections, which is handy
Includes a DVD drive, which not all newer computers do
cons: SSD drives cost more than traditional hard drives per GB of storage

customer_reviews.title: WOW, WOW !!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this new Acer for 2 days but so far I can say this thing rocks ; ) If you want fast this will do a complete reboot in 65 seconds. I will update later but so far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Home Computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer is nice and fast. I didn't think 8GB of memory would be sufficient for everything but gaming. It is much more than adequate when paired with an 8th gen i3 chip. I added an Acer 23" monitor and as such offers all and more than I could need in a home computer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for price
customer_reviews.text: I am almost disappointed to admit that this computer seems to run faster than the "Gaming PC" I own that is more than twice the price. It is also visually appealing and immensely quite. Extremely satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pinger

customer_reviews.title: Terrible machine
customer_reviews.text: Brand new machine that shuts off repeatedly on its own. Already had to take in for service. Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.author: Kpop

customer_reviews.title: it seems has hardware issue
customer_reviews.text: Got it on black Friday with a good price. It has been a month. I always have the following 2 issues. 1> USB ports not functioning well. Connect a Samsung S9 to any of its USB, and Windows 10 file explorer can detect the phone and show the folders, but opening a folder or copying a file to/from a folder takes forever. The same phone connects to my other PC/Laptops works fine. Downloading/Installing Samsung Windows USB driver does not solve this. 2> Quite often, it just shuts down suddenly. It is NOT under a big work load, for example, just editing an small Excel. file. I am thinking to return it....
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Randomly SHUTS DOWN! VERY Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Ran GREAT for first week. Now shuts down without warning when doing light work. Even my laptops have never done this when working hard! Of course, they weren't Acer. This is disgraceful! I needed this for my business and now have to replace it in a hurry. Of course, it is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: With 8GB RAM, this is a lean-running, quick machine. I disable the non-essentials and it has been very fast and reliable for 6 weeks now. I like this machine very much. This is my first Acer, I usually buy Dell or Lenovo and this does not have a bunch of junkware loaded and running like HP's do. Can confidently recommend as a great value for a general-use machine. Would not make a good gaming computer but can handle anything a home or small business needs.
customer_reviews.author: Karl P.

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight, physically and software-wise
customer_reviews.text: I love the build for it's feather light assembly. Easy to get into (2 screws), almost zero bloatware, quick booting, and most everything else. I purchased a m.2 ssd but don't think I will end up using it because the m.2 slot appears to be hidden behind the dvd drive and I don't feel like disassembling the whole unit to install it. Boot time is respectable without it, I suppose. I would buy again...
customer_reviews.author: The Phantom

customer_reviews.title: A great computer for regular use
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent computer. If you are looking for a gaming computer- do not buy this. Go spend $400 more on a real gaming computer. If you are like most people looking for a value computer then buy this. I changed the HDD to a SSD. This computer is absolutely the fastest computer I have owned. I have not found a drawback for regular computer use. Internet access, word processing, spreadsheet, listening to music, some light video editing are all super fast.
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG A BONHAM

customer_reviews.title: successful update to a gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: I brought this computer , a 500G ssd, a 450 PSU and gtx 1070. The new PC works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: steven ren

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I received this computer today, set it up and spent the rest of the afternoon with tech support trying to make it work properly. I can reboot and it works good for a few minutes then slows down to dial up speed! My 6 year old laptop runs circles around this thing. About. 4 days after I wrote this review I turned on the computer and it told me to update and restart. It took an hour or more to install all of the updates and now it is working good.
customer_reviews.author: Tastlikchikn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy setup and the delivery was fast! This is exactly what I was look for in a CPU. Keyboard is small and it doesn't come with a monitor, but I already had the right keyboard, monitor, and mouse that I needed. I was only missing the right CPU and now I have it. AWESOME product for an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome processor weak video.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic pc. The i5 processor is great for gaming but the integrated graphics leaves a lot to be desired. There are no options in the bios to increase the video ram. The motherboard has 2 ram slots populated with a 4 & 8 gb sticks. This computer does have 1 pciex16 slot for a video card but the power supply does not have pcie leads. Meaning that if want to install a gaming video card you will have to upgrade the power supply as well. This computer can play Fortnite at 60fps 1080p with all the graphics set to low.
customer_reviews.author: Some dude on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: Good computer except for wifi card
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good computer for money. Components are fast or at least on par with other computers at this price point. The only disappointment is the wifi card. It is much slower than the card in my old Dell Precision laptop. Obviously, this computer is not for gaming, but that can be remedied by adding a GTX 1050 ti card. The hard disk is fast as far as the transfer rate is concerned, but the boot times could be made much faster by adding an SSD -- for which there is place - there is a third empty SATA connector on the MB.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a tech expert and this is the first new pc I've had in a decade. Windows 10 didn't annoy me like previous versions have, it was quick and easy to set up and get going, and the rating I gave it for "gaming" is high only because I mostly play older games that all run very well. I can't give an intelligent opinion on how this compares to other hardware for modern games that require certain specs. I just know it works well for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Driver

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I am now sending back the second tower. On the first one, the wifi stoped working after three hours! The second one, will not turn on, after the first day. I am going to give up on this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Dirk P. Dorresteyn

customer_reviews.title: Light gaming good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer to play my video games. So far I've only played the SIMS. It is not very fast it doesn't lag alot, picture quality is good not the best but if you're not a professional its everything you will need. So I am satisfied for the moment. Ive only had it for about a month, I will leave more feedback when I begin to install other games. Right now only use Origin, later will review about my steam account and blizzard.
customer_reviews.author: Sesa

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: packaged well and very fast computer, the keyboard and mouse seem a little cheap but i switched over to all Bluetooth. I'm using the dual hdmi ports to power two monitors and it handles it very well for casual use would not recommend if you plan on running games or anything of that sort.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Some Parts Are Defective
customer_reviews.text: I only had this product for just over 2 weeks and it has broken. It mo longer turns on and I suspect, although I may be wrong, that the power supply or something similar is faulty and defective. Buyer beware that this may happen to you. It worked good for 2 weeks and then stopped after normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Acer laptops for years and love them. This desktop was horrible though! First off it's crazy slow. It should be faster based on the specs. The biggest issue though was it's repeated crashing. I got a blue stop error relatedly. At first I thought it was just caused by all the updates. Sadly that was not the case. It crashed multiple times after everything was fully updated. I would steer clear of this PC.
customer_reviews.author: Rm1985

customer_reviews.title: Cost and speed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer to upgrade my 10 year old desktop and the cost is what first caught my eye. I will use it mainly for my hobby in photography but also for general web surfing and maintaining my photo web site. I can not rate it on gaming. So far it works great and I had no trouble setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Doug

customer_reviews.title: Good computer - will it last?
customer_reviews.text: The processor, ram and disk drive are top-notch. Other parts, not so much but mostly ok. Worst is the video; if you're planning on doing any gaming with it plan on getting a video card for it. But if you're a gamer you already knew that. Keyboard and mouse are sub-normal. Fast processor. I had an i5-3350P before this computer and this computer's i5-8400 is a big step up. All in all, I would buy this computer again. But I do recommend buying a 3- or 4-year protection plan if you're planning on using it that long.
customer_reviews.author: Aarffy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great For Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our son for his birthday and he loves it. He plays simulation and sandbox style games and finds it runs them all really well. Even heavy draw ones like BeamNG Drive and War Thunder. He had hoped for a gaming computer but the money just wasn't there so I ordered the best we could afford and he says it is very comparable to what he wanted .
customer_reviews.author: Miranda McCulley

customer_reviews.title: Worst computer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Worst computer ever ... I bought my first computer in 1985! This is garbage. Full of quirks and slow as molasses! Even Solitaire is slow, once it finally loads. The worst ... it suddenly tells me I don't have enough memory to open a web page or open an application even when Task Manager shows 12GB of memory available out of 16GB! And then without warning, it just locks up solid. Customer Service is a waste. They tried a few things and then ... get this ... told me to "keep trying, it might get better " ... and hung up! ARRRGGGG!
customer_reviews.author: PSebelist

customer_reviews.title: It randomly shuts off on it own
customer_reviews.text: This worked for a few months. Then it started just shutting off. I ended up factory resetting it as instructed by winddows, and that did nothing to help the random shutdowns. I do not recomend this product. It is very disappointing as my previous Acers never had that issue. Others who wrote reviews about the shuts downs gave notice. I wish I had listened. My previous Acers were good, but this machine is defective. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great PC for the money
customer_reviews.text: Using this machine as a Plex server and general PC centric tasks like browsing, torrents etc. I don't think I could build it for what they are selling them for, it is a great bargain and a speedy machine. So far very happy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDude

customer_reviews.title: Great value and loaded like the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.text: Good pc for the price, I compared other computers with the same hardware and this one has the best bang for the buck. It's also a nice looking pc, quiet and has plenty of storage and mulitple usb connections. Having a disc drive is a plus. Operating system is ok as I wasn't too used to Windows 10 but the more you use it the easier it becomes. Grandkids play their games on it and works well. Overall great buy for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This computer worked well for 2 weeks only. Then the hard drive crashed. Not sure if I just got a dud or what
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great For Linux - Fast & Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer! I nuked the Windows 10 that came pre-installed, and installed my favorite distro of Linux- and it works flawlessly; and what's more, it is whisper quiet! Great deal for under 400 bananas! I'll be replacing the compact keyboard that came with it, as the keys are so clkose together, I can't type a sentence without making a typo (<---see?)- but hey, that's the onlyu complaint I have, so I certainly can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great value and Performance
customer_reviews.text: Modest size easily fits into surroundings, attractive,quality product finishes. Performs routine computer tasks without hesitation. I am completely pleased. The only criticism would be the cd player loading mechanism feels flimsy but it does work properly. I small number of promotions programs were easily uninstalled and some people would actually want to keep them, just not me.
customer_reviews.author: Charles1951

customer_reviews.title: i7 desktop. SLOW
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty disappointed in the speed of this computer. It is brand new and has no large files or photos installed. Yet it is glitchy and lags intermittently even while using basic desktop functions or web browsing. Unfortunately I waited too long and can no longer return it for a refund. ******* 5-20-20 Update, I have now had professional help clearing out any unwanted apps or programs that came with the computer, changing the performance settings, and unfortunately, it did not help much. If you feel like waiting 10 minutes to open a simple folder then this computer is right for you. otherwise, stay clear at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Windows crashed it right out of box
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 crashed out of the box. Awaiting new start up disc. Very disappointed. It was an Xmas gift for a friend. Very embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: dr gio

customer_reviews.title: Time to replace after a year
customer_reviews.text: I work from home as a technical writer and thought this machine would suffice at half the price of the Dells I usually buy, which last generally three years. After 12 months, I'm replacing it as it is unbelievably slow and little by little things aren't working the way they should. A reboot usually fixes the issue, but when it takes more than five minutes to reboot (even with all the start up programs managed/minimized), it's time to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: A great sturdy buy. While it might be listed ac a gaming pc, it really isnt aimed at that. sure, you can roll some on it, and all will look good. But this is really, truly, more of a home office pc, than a gaming rig. Rocks straight out of the box - which my cats Love as it makes a great in room 'fort' for them (the empty box, folks) - and it does indeed run super fast. Ram seems capable, I've been running some site transfers today on it, and it's working fine with that, speedy and completing as required on multiple task lanes.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherBuyer

customer_reviews.title: not for gaming
customer_reviews.text: This is a good computer for anything except for gaming. I thought with the 8700 I7 processor it would be better than my 3 year old amd10 computer but the integrated uhd 630 graphics card on this computer is not going to allow it to play anything real well. I had to put civilization to minimum graphics or it would delay and lag. I did not think civ 5 was a taxing computer. returned computer and had to purchase something much more expensive. Great computer if you are not doing any intense gaming.
customer_reviews.author: brianandjudi

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer, I got this for my son for Christmas. He wanted to have a gaming pc. He installed a graphics card and a 500w ATX power supply, I suggest you get a ITX size graphics card for this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this computer!
customer_reviews.text: Worst buy ever!! Very low quality computer. It is very slow and shuts down repeatedly after only owning it a few months. We tried technical support, and their only advice was to ship the computer back to them with us having to pay for the shipping and packing costs. We took it to local store who told us the motherboard was bad and not worth the cost of fixing due to the quality of the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Berto

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad i got this deal & it was a 5 payment plan to,,setup was easy the pc is very quiet running and my applications open pretty fast..now for me i do like some games so i got a EVGA GeForce GT 1030 SC 2GB GDDR5 Low Profile Graphic Cards 02G-P4-6333-KR  Hope This Helps
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Renner

customer_reviews.title: Great home computer
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out why my monitor wasn't bright enough, even though all the settings on the actual monitor had it set super bright, and I figured out Windows 10 has a setting in it that basically halves the brightness when you first install it and once I found that setting and turned it off, I can't complain about anything else. Lots of power and speed, the graphics are pretty nice. Very quiet. Wish the light on the front of the tower didn't blink non-stop when the computer is asleep, but other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G Petschke

customer_reviews.title: Great for basic online gaming and web use.
customer_reviews.text: Very quick computer, bought it for my child to play online games, and she is playing Steam games with no issues. Great system.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Heywood

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: For my purposes, I couldn’t have purchased a better pc for the money! I mostly use a pc to support my mobile devices, therefore really didn’t want to spend much money. This baby is fast and powerful for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Ward-Bilty

customer_reviews.title: Fast, quiet and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This desktop is fast, quiet and easy to set up. I have been impressed with the speed. I am not gaming with it, just use it for my real estate business and I am flying around the programs and web sites I use to conduct my business. I am so impressed, I will be buying another for my wife to replace her dated tower. Thanks! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Cregan

customer_reviews.title: Good specs for cost, great for many things, but not ready for gaming OOTB
customer_reviews.text: This will be great as a general purpose home PC. Lots of RAM and HDD storage, and the processor is nice and quick. It was very simple to set up and start using. This could be a good foundation for a decent gaming rig, but be prepared to add both a graphics card and a more capable power supply unit to finish the package, if that's what you're wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace an older Dell and Acer had what I needed at a reasonable price. So far, it has exceeded my expectations. Would recommend to anyone seeking faster speed and better Internet response. I'm not a gamer, so I can't provide a rating for gaming, but I do play other on-line games and the Acer is very responsive for these.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: PC would not boot, displaying an error. None of the repair/reset options worked. I was forced to re-install Windows and all drivers manually. This is a second time I experienced similar issue with Acer desktops.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Holden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a year
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price I paid. About a year later my sound output is having issues from all ports options. I use it for a home recording of :( starting to build my own however I will be keeping this PC for other things. Great little machine overall.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for the money
customer_reviews.text: This computer is highly recommended to anyone looking for fast. I have three screens and 40 or so tabs open at once. Handles them all like a champ. Tons of memory. If you're looking for fast general processing of "normal" business work related things, shop no more.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought the i7-7000 with the 512 SSD. Pros: It is super fast and reliable. (windows boots up super fast) Great Price Quiet Cons: Some unnecessary software which was already installed I would suggest getting a SSD to ensure that the OS will run quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ACT

customer_reviews.title: Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: So far, this PC is performing much better than I expected. My HP Slimline's DVD drive failed after 10 months and HP would not honor the warranty. They said I should have bought better coverage. Huh?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for what I use it for
customer_reviews.text: This is a great general use PC. Not made for extreme gaming, but works decently for general use and light video processing. [EDIT] THE DAY AFTER I WROTE THIS THE USB PORTS FAILED. I HAVE TO SHIP IT TO ACER FOR REPAIR (AT THEIR EXPENSE) AND LOSE USE OF IT FOR A COUPLE OF WEEKS. ONLY HAD IT ABOUT 9-10 WEEKS.
customer_reviews.author: JerryInDFW

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a replacement for our old laptop
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What a difference time makes. We bought this to replace our laptop (circa 2006) and the speed difference is huge. It's not big machine and fits easily under the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Worst computer we've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Since ordering this computer last November we have had nothing but issues. It shuts down in the middle of a program or window open, while doing business, doesn't close out programs properly. At least 3x a day it is kicking us off to restart and then has problems reloading everything. It is NOT our server, router, modem, wifi issues because everything else in the house works fine. Now we are stuck with this computer
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn H.

customer_reviews.title: It works! and is relatively fast.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. My only improvement would be to put more than one usb port on the front. It has plenty on the back. I actually like the little wired keyboard and mouse that are included. Keyboard has 2 little legs on it to tilt it towards you. Good price too! Not disapointed at all with this pc. My 3rd Acer.
customer_reviews.author: harrisrb

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: If you want to turn this into a gaming machine simply add a video card and bigger power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P.

customer_reviews.title: amazon alwaays makes it right.
customer_reviews.text: acer p/c had some issues that could not download all it's advertised items. a quick call , and a replacement arrived in less than 36 hours, even during a snow storm in north Carolina.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Smith

customer_reviews.title: somewhat above average
customer_reviews.text: For everyday games and word processing this is a decent machine. Definitely not a true gaming computer, but then it wasn't advertised as none.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solution for Acer Blue Screen of Death
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC for my son. Within a few days, it had the same problem that many other reviewers have mentioned: the blue screen of death. Each BSOD came with a different error message. I tried everything I could think of to solve the problem: restore to a point before the last Microsoft update, reinstall drivers, etc. Nothing worked. Then I swapped out the RAM. Since then, I've never had a BSOD on this machine. It's the RAM. Swap it out and the problem will go away. Shame on Acer for letting this issue slip past quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Bob McLain

customer_reviews.title: Quick and great value
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when the first one I received was dead on arrival. However, Amazon promptly shipped a replacement. So far, it works great. It's quick and gets the job done for most basic computing tasks for an older user I purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Balouchi

customer_reviews.title: HAS A PROBLEM !
customer_reviews.text: Computer shuts down on its own.Some kind of power failure.Not worth the risk of buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It shuts down with no reason!!!
customer_reviews.text: I 'm using this desk top barely 2 times a week for email and browsing this that,after only 9 mos it start shuts down unpredictably and sometime noted it run or start up so slow. So disappointed and hope that the Manufacture has a solution to fix it !
customer_reviews.author: frontier

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The computer does everything it says in the ad. Very good computer for the price I purchased it for on Black Friday. Great for the use of an office computer, which I use it for. However, the DVD ROM is a little flimsy but works fine.
customer_reviews.author: JSJ

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are good enough for casual gamer, but weak for anyone that has intensive graphics. UPDATE: system went into sleep mode and now it will no longer boots up. I'm livid eith this piece of junk. 8 months it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Clide

customer_reviews.title: Really slow computer
customer_reviews.text: Runs slow. With Word docs, spreadsheets, and files open- works like I'm on dial-up when I'm simply switching between docs and spreadsheets and not even using the internet. Never even used gaming on this computer. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: madhavadas

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old PC with a new one when it quit on me. This one has windows 10 and it is taking me a little bit more to adjust to then I expected. It is a lot faster then my old one, but it working very well.
customer_reviews.author: LingerieLvr

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off on its own constantly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this November 2018. It keeps shutting down after startup. It’ll only run basic programs. No online games at all. My kids can’t even do their school work on it. It’ll cycle through on/off over and over again. Don’t buy this piece of crap. I’m not even going to try to replace parts. I have tried all sorts of fixes. Nothing helps. Called customer service. It is out of warranty & they just transfer you to a technician for a fee. I hung up & I’m now looking for a new desktop. Will never buy Acer again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Bradwin

customer_reviews.title: Worst computer Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using computers since before windows. This computer is the worst one I've ever owned. It just doesn't work right and constantly has to have the hard drive reformatted
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No problems, a great machine for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Still working well after 3 weeks - so I expect a long and useful life. I'm not a gamer, but do lots of photo and video editing - and this box certainly earns it keep with such a low price. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Began to have hardware problems within two years, but after MFG warranty expiration
customer_reviews.text: I would avoid this PC. It has the blue screen of death within two years of purchase. This is the 2nd ACER computer I've had issues with (the first was a laptop). I will not be purchasing anything from their company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor K. Skaar

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this desktop
customer_reviews.text: Box was a little beat up when it got here but it was packaged well so no damage to computer. I am very pleased with my purchase. Computer is fast and the price was excellent. Highly recommend for a nice home pc.
customer_reviews.author: Michele W

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I think they sent me a refurbished machine. The mouse keeps freezing, control alt, delete doesn't work. This thing has given me a major migraine.
customer_reviews.author: Connie K.

customer_reviews.title: Computer didn't work more...CHECK THE WARRANTY!!!! Disappointed with Acer
customer_reviews.text: Something happen to the computer, and it didn't start any more. I purchased this product on January 2019, and after 14 months, the computer didn't work any more. They told me that is out of warranty, I can send it for repair for around $400... very disappointed for a NON cheap computer
customer_reviews.author: Alex2015

customer_reviews.title: This computer does the job
customer_reviews.text: This was a good upgrade for me. The computer is fast and powerful for my various office needs. I compose books and it works just fine. I do not do gaming.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Great Machines for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of these for the office. They are running the latest and greatest software and are fast. Everyone in the office loves the speed.
customer_reviews.author: jazzyj

customer_reviews.title: Has been crashing frequently since first purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few Acer laptops in the past with no problems, this desktop has been a nightmare, it crashes repeatedly. I've run restore multiple times, tried all sorts of diagnostics and can't figure it out. I noticed a few other reviews mention this so I'm not the only person this is happening to with this model. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good product from acer
customer_reviews.text: Only had a few weeks, but use it to stream movies onto a 4K TV, works great no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jay K.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Price was too good to be true. After three weeks, we were greeted by blue and black "screens of death," a "SMART detection error" and boot failure.
customer_reviews.author: RCT

customer_reviews.title: So-so desktop
customer_reviews.text: Works OK most time. Just ordered extra memory. Seems to have a problem with too many windows open at one time. Will lock up / run slow. Hope 16 GB solves problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rosetejas

customer_reviews.title: Moniter adapter doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Have been trying to get support on the adapter which has not been working . Now I am infuriated because tech support does not support just transfer you and put you on hold for a ridiculously long time. I am even more mad because i purchased warranty and can not get any assistance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much to change about this computer
customer_reviews.text: Up and running 10 days now and I was surprised there were not problems. The thing is real quiet and quick to load and shut down. I have not complaints. My rule is that you can not have too many USB ports. This machine has more than most, but most accessories need a port and I could use some more.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Good computer for the money; but don't forget to buy your coupling if you want two monitors
customer_reviews.text: I really like the computer it's quick has a lot of memory and I believe it was a value for the money I do wish it had more connection ports so that I could easily hook up two monitors but I bought a coupling device that made it easy so all-in-all I am loving the new computer
customer_reviews.author: Monique Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I don't do "gaming" on my computer but I have discovered that the gaming computers are faster than the regular computers. This is my 2nd gaming computer, I also have an acer laptop that I love!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Evans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this computer is excellent for multitasking and web browsing. For gaming, not so much, you can run CS:GO and Overwatch at 50 FPS on low setting but it’s not really a gaming machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Brown

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 10 year old.
customer_reviews.text: For a 10 year old kid, this thing is OP! Does everything it should and it arrived rather quickly. I haven't had any issues with it and it's been in use for over 4 months now. Great buy for the price and what it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Koscak

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We bought this on a Thanksgiving day special. We saved about $100 making this computer an outstanding value. So far it’s a great all around good desktop. Speedy and great specs.
customer_reviews.author: happy2bshopping

customer_reviews.title: Works right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for another computer that would not run correctly - same make and model. This machine is perfect! Things happen - but all is good now.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Clarke

customer_reviews.title: This is not a gaming computer, but great for home or office use!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is fast and quiet. It meets my expectations and more. The graphics card would need to be upgraded for gaming , but is fine for video streaming and general use. This is a great computer for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burchill

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Run quite, the interface is clean.. the loading speed is very fast to be Factory but its definitely upgradeable
customer_reviews.author: Grant Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase from them again
customer_reviews.text: This computer would not stay on and we had to return it. The company did not respond to our requests for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Vaalue ok
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent value, but the keyboard layout is not good. I'm still using my Dell keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Giraci

customer_reviews.title: I got a lemon and it cost me even more money.
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a little over one month when it stopped booting in its own and started running incredibly slow, freezing, and detecting a SMART error - some sort of warning that the hard drive was failing. Support had me try a couple of things and then it wouldn't boot at all. They told me to ship it in for service which cost me another $85. Not pleased at all. Guess I should have bought local.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Apple

customer_reviews.title: Got a good deal and works well
customer_reviews.text: Not a gaming PC beyond maybe 2009 PC games, but a great budget desktop. Haven't had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gorall

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: No matter what i did to streamline bulky Win 10, the computer was slow. I returned it and bought a Dell refurbished Optiplex that is way faster.....for less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Judd

customer_reviews.title: never worked out of box.
customer_reviews.text: Tech support did what they could. determined windows was not installed. they sent a thumb drive to install which took 9 days to get here and still did not work. sent for return. We will let you know how that turn s out. One of very few times we have been disappointed with an Amazon order. Seems like a long tme without a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Dosnt come with office but does come with spam
customer_reviews.text: tech support had me reinstall the OS for an office product code issue. turns out this dosent come with office you have to purchase separately. BUT comes LOADED with garbage! fantastic waisted 4 hrs of my day with tech support to find out it dosnt come with the basic software needed.
customer_reviews.author: Erika R

customer_reviews.title: Audio out put options good be better
customer_reviews.text: Great tower for the money no free ware cloging up the system and super fast decent graphics also. No complaints after two months of use
customer_reviews.author: Chef Mike

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am not gaming, but speed might be marginal. Download speed is reasonable, fast storage access.
customer_reviews.author: flyer182

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to have something to use but it’s soooooo slow and already freezing. Definitely looking for a new replacement DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Marie Allyce

customer_reviews.title: Supports 4k 30fps screen
customer_reviews.text: Loads fast. Use just for surfing the internet, havr 27inch 4k screen it works great on that
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Hart

customer_reviews.title: It is okay I do not regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly I got this as a work computer. As a gaming computer I would not really recommend it unless you want to play things like plants vs zombies or something.
customer_reviews.author: John Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my old desk top. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yess

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire TC-885-UR14 Desktop, 8th Gen Intel Core i5-8400, 8GB DDR4, 512GB SSD, 8X DVD, 802.11ac WiFi, Windows 10 Home
product_meta.description: processor_description:Core i5-8400| Size:8GB DDR4, 512GB SSDAcer Aspire TC-885-UR14 Desktop PC comes with these specs: 8th Generation Intel Core i5-8400 Processor 2.8GHz with Turbo Boost 2.0 Technology up to 4.0GHz, Windows 10 Home, 8GB DDR4 2666MHz RAM Memory, Intel UHD Graphics 630, 8X DVD-Writer Double-Layer Drive (DVD-RW), 512GB SSD, High-Def Audio with 5.1-Channel Surround Sound Support, 1 - USB 3.1 Type C Gen 2 port (up to 10 Gbps) (Front), 1 - USB 3.1 Gen 2 Port (Front), 2 - USB 3.1 Gen 1 Ports (Rear), 4 - USB 2.0 Ports (Rear), 2 - HDMI Ports (Rear), 1 - VGA Port (Rear), 802.11ac WiFi, 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN (RJ-45 Port), Bluetooth 5.0, 300W Power Supply, USB Keyboard and Optical Mouse, 17.2 lbs. | 7.8 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support (DT.BAPAA.004)

8GB DDR4 2666MHz Memory, 512GB SSD & 8X DVD-Writer Double-Layer Drive (DVD-RW)
